timeline.label: BHL was established
timeline.description: BHL was founded, and became the authorized reseller of a Japanese brand and an American brand in south China.

timeline.label: Turnover over 30 million
timeline.description: BHL achieved a total yearly turnover of 30 million yuan in the aerospace industry and auto part industry.

timeline.label: Independent research and development
timeline.description: BHLâ€™s self-developed online measuring system was successfully tested on machine.

timeline.label: BHL measuring system, officially sold
timeline.description: BHL began to officially sell the infrared measuring system of its own brand, and established in-depth cooperation with the innovation mold processing plant.

timeline.label: BHL metering system, sales exceeded 3000
timeline.description: BHL officially received certificates of patents and trademarks for the measuring systems of its own brand, and successfully sold more than 3,000 sets of measuring systems.

timeline.label: Plant upgrade
timeline.description: The innovation mold processing plant of BHL brand was officially upgraded as Suzhou Gu Bo Te Precision Machinery Co., Ltd.
